channel.title: Culture on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in Culture on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: The Manifesto
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Aim for Quality Quality exists in every piece of work. We thrive to deliver the best because we can.

item.title: Growth Is Our Universal Language
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: At Dwarves, the core team live and breathe growth. We believe that growth is our universal language, and we’re always striving to improve ourselves, both personally and professionally.

item.title: Ogif
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: I would like to introduce to you our new initiative called OGIF — Oh God It’s Friday. Moving forward, our Friday Showcase will have a broader range of topics to discuss and share.

item.title: The Inner Circle
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: The concept of an “inner circle” within a company is not a new one, and at Dwarves, a software company founded by a group of engineers, this idea holds a significant value.

item.title: Sharing
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Sharing At Dwarves Foundation, we believe that sharing is an important part of our culture. We share almost everything: every week, a lot of events are open to the public, and some of them are recorded so that anyone can watch the videos to learn.

item.title: Continuing Education Allowance
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Continuing Education Allowance You will always grow by learning and playing with new and cool technologies. From books to conferences, you’ll get a yearly budget for your learning and development goals.

item.title: The Dwarves Culture Handbook
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: For the past 5 years, we didn’t have something called ‘Culture Book’. Whenever a newbie steps in, it’s natural to pick up the job and go with the flow.

item.title: What we value
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: What we value Before anything else, values come first. The value is important to us. They are what we proud of.
